title: The always on display animination is not Smooth.
content:
As you can see in the video.
When there's a new notification,the normal always on display screen will turn off and turn on again to show the new notification,when I double tap the screen, the wallpaper show up and the time will move with a smooth animination.
When I double tap the screen or home button,the normal always display screen will turn off and show the time and wallpaper.
Is that just a bug?My friend's pixel 3 has a smooth animination when double tap the screen with a smooth animination,but I am not.
